item.title: File Checksum on macOS
item.description: Checksum command MD5 md5 FILE SHA-1 shasum -a 1 FILE SHA-256 shasum -a 256 FILE SHA-512 shasum -a 512 FILE OpenSSL MD5 openssl md5 FILE SHA-1 openssl sha1 FILE SHA-256 openssl sha256 FILE SHA-512 openssl sha512 FILE References Check MD5 Hash on your Mac Verify SHA1 Hash with openssl Check SHA1 Checksum in Mac OS X How to Check sha256 Hash of a File on Mac How to Check SHA512 Checksum on Mac How to use checksums on Mac to verify app downloads
